name: Swaelo Asteroids
description:
Here another one of my arcade classic clone projects that I love making so much.  
This is one everyone has likely heard of before, but maybe not, the original Asteroids game is starting to become ancient history.  
As always you can find the source code for the entire project on my github https://github.com/Swaelo/Swaelo-Asteroids  
Let me know what you think of it :)
